lines.text: What's with the balloons? It's not one of my kids' birthday is it?
No, time to roll out the cul-de-sac welcome wagon. We have new neighbors moving into the old Wagner house.
Oh, man, the Wagners! Now that was a great divorce.
You knew the end was near when he and his secretary started taking Lamaze classes together.
that's right! In those tight, tight shorts on that even tighter butt? What ever happened to him?
He hurt his back giving her horsey rides in the deep end.
See, you're lucky. Your kitchen window faces north. Me, all I ever get to see is old man Kelly hiding whiskey bottles in his koi pond.
Ladies, ladies, must you diminish yourselves with idle gossip?
Sure!
It's fun.

It's an invasion of privacy. And so often the facts are wrong. For instance, Mr. Kelly isn't hiding whiskey bottles, it's vodka. And they're not koi, they're goldfish. It's a common mistake. And as for the Wagners, he wasn't having an affair with his secretary, it was his receptionist. And as far as Mrs. Wagner and the pool man, yes, she was doing him.

[bringing baby Zachary home from the hospital]
Paul and Caryl just got out of their minivan!
This is so exciting! Have they done the paternity test yet?
We were all sort of figuring Paul was the father.
That's so convenient, I mean he already lives here.

[sarcastically referring to Tiffany]
Such a pretty face.

[Marilyn and Kasey are in the drive-thru of Dougals]
May I take your order please?
Yes, I'd like one Double Dougal, two half Dougals, one with cheese. A double cheeseburger special meal with a diet cola. Two regular fries, an apple pie, two small colas, and chocolate shake.
May I take your order please?
Allow me, I'd like one Double Dougal, two half Dougals, one with cheese. A double cheeseburger special meal with a diet cola. Two regular fries, an apple pie, two small colas, and chocolate shake.
Would you like something to drink with that?
What kind of person hires a moron like that?
[camera then shows Adam working the drive-thru window]
Blake and Danny are still in the minivan, behaving I hope.

[speaking into the drive-thru speaker at Dougals]
And a hundred and twenty-eight Double Dougals, you dork!
Do you need a bag for that?

[Marilyn's minivan is broke down in the drive-thru]
I called AAA for you.
What did they say?
That you taken the first step by admitting you have a problem.
Tiffany, I don't have a drinking problem.
That's what they said you'd say!
I'll call. Kasey, want to see what they put in the fish sandwiches?
Isn't it fish?
Ha ha ha ha!

[To Marilyn]
How about some strong black coffee?
Sure.
Would you like fries with that?
